sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
Suppose that 
\[
	\frac{p }{a } = \frac{q }{b } = \frac{r }{c }
\]
Then show that each ratio is equal to
\[
	\left(\frac{3 p ^3 - 2 q ^3 + 8 r ^3}{3 a ^3 - 2 b ^3 + 8 c ^3}\right)^{1/3}
\]
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "It is given that 
\[
	\frac{p }{a } = \frac{q }{b } = \frac{r }{c } = d \textrm{ assume}
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow p = ad , q = bd , r = cd 
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
Given expression is
\[
	\left(\frac{3 p ^3 - 2 q ^3 + 8 r ^3}{3 a ^3 - 2 b ^3 + 8 c ^3}\right)^{1/3}
\]
\[
	= \left(\frac{3 d ^3 a ^3 - 2 d ^3 b ^3 + 8 d ^3 c ^3}{3 a ^3 - 2 b ^3 + 8 c ^3}\right)^{1/3}
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	\left(\frac{d ^3 (3 a ^3 - 2 b ^3 + 8 c ^3)}{3 a ^3 - 2 b ^3 + 8 c ^3}\right)^{1/3}
\]
\[
	= (d ^3)^{1/3}
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	= d 
\]"}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
Which is equal to each ratio.

Hence proved.
\newline

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [], "text": "$$\text{After assumption $\frac{p }{a } = \frac{q }{b} = \frac{r }{c } = d$ and taking terms separately we get $p = ad , q = bd , r = cd$}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Upon taking the expression, and substituting the value of $p$, $q$, and $r$, in the expression, we get $\left(\frac{3 d ^3 a ^3 - 2 d ^3 b ^3 + 8 d ^3 c ^3}{3 a ^3 - 2 b ^3 + 8 c ^3}\right)^{1/3}$}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{"Upon further simplification of the previous equation we get $\left(\frac{d ^3 (3 a ^3 - 2 b ^3 + 8 c ^3)}{3 a ^3 - 2 b ^3 + 8 c ^3}\right)^{1/3}=(d ^3)^{1/3}$}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": " "}, {"data": [], "text": " "}]
